greeting: Welcome {user.mention}! You have joined the candy game with 50 candy. Get ready to trick or treat! ğŸƒ
goodbye: Goodbye, {user}! We hope to see you again soon.
about:
Boo! I'm here to spread spooky fun, and BloominDaisy made sure I'm filled with tricks and treats! ğŸƒ

In this candy-filled adventure, you can steal candy from others, give treats to your friends, and even join the candy lottery!
Try your luck with these commands: `/trick` to try to nab candy, `/give_treat` to treat a friend, and `/buy_potion` to win big in the cauldron event!

More haunted surprises are on the way, so keep your eyes peeled! Got any ghostly feedback or need help? Contact BloominDaisy if you dare! ğŸ‘»

return.personal_message: Welcome back, {user.mention}! The candy-filled adventure awaits. Get ready for more spooky tricks and sweet treats!

event_messages.0: The Agency gazes upon {user.mention} with cold indifference. **0 candy** was givenâ€”perhaps a chilling reminder that nothing comes for free, or simply that Greed's attention is elsewhere.
event_messages.1: A single piece of candy was gifted to {user.mention} by The Agency. Is this a trick, a test, or just Greedâ€™s way of toying with you? Either way, every single piece counts!
event_messages.10: {user.mention} just received {amount} candy, courtesy of The Agency. Be carefulâ€”this small token may come with a price... Greed always has a plan!
event_messages.50: {user.mention} was gifted {amount} candy by The Agency. Are they trying to win your loyalty, or are you just another part of their sinister experiments?
event_messages.100: A generous gift of {amount} candy from The Agency! But beware... Greed never gives without expecting something in return.
event_messages.250: {user.mention} received a spooky stockpile of {amount} candy from The Agency. They must have big plans for you in their twisted quest for control!
event_messages.500: {amount} candy, straight from The Agencyâ€™s dark vaults. {user.mention}, youâ€™re now swimming in candy, but at what cost? Greed never rests!

event_messages.else: The Agency, led by the insatiable Greed, has bestowed an otherworldly {amount} candy upon {user.mention}. Their plans for you must be more sinister than ever!

event_messages.10: The Agency has quietly removed {amount} candy from {user.mention}... just a small taste of what they can take away.
event_messages.50: Without warning, {amount} candy was taken from {user.mention} by The Agency. Greed's influence grows, and who knows what else they'll take next?

event_messages.negative: The Agency shows no mercy to {user.mention}. They are now in debt to the dark forces with a **negative candy balance** of {new_candy_count}... perhaps Greed will come to collect sooner than they think.
event_messages.all: The Agency has stripped {user.mention} of all their candy! With nothing left, they stand empty-handed, and Greed is surely satisfied... for now.
event_messages.1: {user.mention} felt the icy grip of The Agency as they took away a single candy. One candy might seem small, but when Greed is involved, nothing is ever trivial.
